modules.name: OBS Master Control Panel
modules.description: Complete OBS Studio remote control panel with web-based UI - audio mixing, streaming, recording, scene item transforms, filters, transitions, studio mode, and web dashboard. Like having OBS Studio's UI in your browser with real-time live updates.
modules.author: GothBot Team

ui.title: OBS Master Control
ui.description: Complete OBS Studio remote control panel with dashboard

features: 9 reactive Svelte components with real-time updates
Profile switcher with create, delete, export
Scene collection manager (switch, create, delete, export)
Video settings panel (resolution, FPS, format, presets)
Replay buffer controller (start, stop, save, duration config)
Virtual camera manager (format selection, compatibility matrix)
Alert testing interface (6 alert types with visual feedback)
Connection status monitor with uptime tracking
7 RESTful API endpoints for UI integration
Complete audio mixer (volume, mute, balance, sync offset)
Recording controls (start, stop, pause, split, chapters)
Scene item transforms (position, scale, rotation, crop, bounds)
Studio mode (preview to program, T-bar control, animated transitions)
Layer ordering (z-index, bring to front, send to back)
Virtual camera control (start, stop, format selection)
Automation action routing for all controllers

changelog.2.4.0: Phase 5: Complete web-based dashboard UI - 9 Svelte components (dashboard, status, profile switcher, collection switcher, video settings, replay buffer control, virtual camera control, automation builder, alert tester). 7 REST API endpoints for UI integration. WebSocket server for real-time synchronization. Responsive design (mobile-first, tablet, desktop). Event monitoring and broadcasting. Full test suite with unit, integration, and E2E tests. ~4,000 lines of new code.
changelog.2.3.0: Phase 4: Added advanced OBS features - Virtual camera control (11 methods), Replay buffer management (12 methods), Profile switching (11 methods), Scene collection management (12 methods), Video settings control (16 methods). 60 new API methods in context.obsControl.virtualCam, .replayBuffer, .profiles, .sceneCollections, and .videoSettings. Total controllers: 14, total methods: 174+
changelog.2.2.0: Phase 3: Added complete filter and transition control. Filter management (17 methods) - create, remove, enable/disable, configure, reorder. Transition control (11 methods) - select, duration, settings, progress. Studio mode (9 methods) - preview to program, T-bar control, animated transitions. 37 new API methods in context.obsControl.filters and context.obsControl.transitions
changelog.2.1.0: Phase 2: Added complete scene item transform control - position, scale, rotation, crop, bounds, alignment, visibility, locking, layer ordering, blend modes. 27 new API methods in context.obsControl.sceneItems
changelog.2.0.0: Major rewrite: Transformed from overlay dependency to complete OBS remote control panel. Added audio mixer, streaming controls, recording controls. Removed alert functionality (moved to core overlay system). Breaking changes: API renamed context.obsApi â†’ context.obsControl, restructured into controllers.
changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with basic OBS control and dynamic alert engine

modules.name: Alert System
modules.description: Multi-platform stream alerts with custom animations, sounds, and TTS support. Display beautiful alerts for follows, subscriptions, raids, donations, and cheers.
modules.author: GothBot Team
features: 5 alert types (Follow, Subscribe, Raid, Donation, Cheer)
5 animation styles (Slide, Fade, Bounce, Zoom, Confetti)
Custom sound effects with volume control
